Sentencas: A glass-ceramic composition was designed and tested for use as a sealant in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) planar stack design.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells application: Characterization and performance in dual atmosphere

Sentencas: The crystallization behaviour was investigated by calculating the Avrami parameter (n) and the activation energy for crystallization (E-c) was obtained.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells application: Characterization and performance in dual atmosphere

Sentencas: The calculated values for n and Ec were 3 and 413.5 kj/mol respectively.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells application: Characterization and performance in dual atmosphere

Sentencas: The results of thermal analyses indicate that this composition shows no overlap between the sintering and crystallization stages and thus an almost pore-free sealant can be deposited and sintered at 850 degrees C in air for 30 min.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells application: Characterization and performance in dual atmosphere

Sentencas: A gas tightness test has been carried out at 800 degrees C for 1100 h in dual atmosphere (Ar-H-2 and air) without recording any leakage.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells application: Characterization and performance in dual atmosphere

Sentencas: Morphological and crystalline phase analyses were conducted prior and following tests in dual atmospheres in order to assess the compatibility of the proposed sealant with the metallic interconnect.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant for solid oxide fuel cells application: Characterization and performance in dual atmosphere
